Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update BUT-PPG pipeline documentation for correct dataset structure

Updated documentation to reflect the actual BUT-PPG dataset structure
discovered during implementation:

Changes:
========

1. Download section:
   - Updated to ZIP download method (86.7 MB single file)
   - Corrected annotation filenames (quality-hr-ann.csv, subject-info.csv)
   - Fixed output structure showing actual extracted directory layout
   - Added note about 6-digit record ID format

2. Processor section:
   - Updated usage with --annotations-dir argument
   - Corrected raw-dir path to point to extracted dataset directory
   - Updated arguments list

3. Troubleshooting section:
   - Fixed 404 error solutions (ZIP download vs individual records)
   - Updated missing annotations troubleshooting
   - Added automatic column detection explanation
   - Realistic processing time estimates (~10-15 minutes for 3,888 recordings)
   - Better subset testing instructions

Key Corrections:
===============
BEFORE: Individual record download, separate annotation files
AFTER: Single ZIP download, combined annotation files

BEFORE: subject_100/100001.dat
AFTER: but-ppg-an-annotated-photoplethysmography-dataset-2.0.0/100001_PPG.dat

BEFORE: PPGQualityLabels.csv, HRReference.csv, MotionLabels.csv
AFTER: quality-hr-ann.csv (quality+HR), subject-info.csv (motion+demographics)

Related to: dd207d0 (pipeline fix)

)")
